title: Turn a handle, flick a switch. - 2nd rev. ed.
brief_description: Shows how basic domestic services, such as gas, electricity and water are provided. Deals with the source of these services, their reticulation and home usage. The program ends with a strong conservation message - “turn off the light, etc.” Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
